answerText: Minecraft [10] This 2008 Jonathan Blow game is a puzzle-platformer that utilizes inventive mechanics related to time manipulation. The story centers on Tim's attempts to track down the princess, an allegory for the atomic bomb.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | MIT A  | 9 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Name some independent video games, for 10 points each. [10] This extremely successful Mojang game features blocky graphics and enemies called Creepers. Game play centers on gathering materials underground, after which they can be used to build just about anything.
